arm_group.description: Inpatient using the cinepazide in department of neurology

brief_summary.textblock:
Cinepazide Maleate Injection is widely used in cerebrovascular disease in china. The safety
      of the cinepazide, especially the blood system, has not been fully evaluated in Chinese
      population. In order to improve the rational use of cinepazide, the investigators observe
      its clinical use in the real world in China, evaluate its safety and clinical benefit in a
      large Chinese population.

clinical_study.brief_title: Post-Marketing Surveillance of the Cinepazide Maleate Injection: a Real World Study

detailed_description.textblock:
Cinepazide was firstly approved in France in 1974, and the formulations are injection and
      tablet. Products containing cinepazide have been withdrawn in 1990s by the manufacturers
      because of lacking of demonstrated efficacy and the risk of agranulocytosis in some European
      countries, such as France, Spain, Italy. In some Aisa countries, it has not been
      re-registered in Japan in 2000s, and the injection is still used in China and Korea. In
      china, Cinepazide Maleate Injection was approved by China Food and Drug Administration(CFDA)
      in 2002, and widely used in cerebrovascular disease. The safety of the Cinepazide,
      especially the adverse drug reactions in the blood system, has not benn fully evaluated in
      Chinese population. In this study, clinical pharmacists in selected hospitals will record
      the clinical use and the adverse drug reactions/ adverse drug events of this injection. This
      real world study for Cinepazide Maleate Injection with 18000 patients will be conducted from
      Sep. 2012 to June. 2014.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Inpatient using the cinepazide in the department of neurology

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  none

study_pop.textblock: Inpatient using the cinepazide in the department of neurology in 61 hospitals in China.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse drug reaction of cinepazide in department of neurology

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_title: Suodi ZHAI, Department of Pharmacy, Peking University Third Hospital

secondary_outcome.description: Outcomes including cure, improved, null, or death.
secondary_outcome.measure: Outcomes of the patients who experienced an adverse drug reaction of cinepazide.

secondary_outcome.description: We will analyse whether some factors, such as age, gender, medical history and etc, would be the predictors of the adverse drug reaction of cinepazide.
secondary_outcome.measure: The predictors of the adverse drug reaction of cinepazide

secondary_outcome.description: The types of the adverse drug reaction of cinepazide including Nausea, vomiting, itching and etc.
secondary_outcome.measure: Types of the adverse drug reaction of cinepazide.

secondary_outcome.description: Treatments including oxygen, steroids, and etc. According to severity of the adverse drug reactions, we will analyse the features the treatments, such as types and numbers.
secondary_outcome.measure: The treatment when patients experienced an adverse drug reaction of cinepazide.
